item.title: How to run a source that doesnt have a run for CentoOS VPS
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

[quote=“SilesX, post:2, topic:453151”][quote author=Nice Boots link=topic=556002.msg4070322#msg4070322 date=1344287390]
title says it all
[/quote]
Clearing throat
Cough Ide cough
www.eclipse.org/[/quote]
You have to be stupid. Why would you run it with an IDE? Do you have ANY clue how much memory that takes up? It would drastically destroy the server performance.

@OP: That OS has to have some sort of bash to call the JVM, google it.

Read full topic

Nice Boots:

title says it all

Clearing throat
Cough Ide cough

eclipse.org

Eclipse - The Eclipse Foundation open source community website.

Eclipse is probably best known as a Java IDE, but it is more: it is an IDE framework, a tools framework, an open source project, a community, an eco-system, and a foundation.
